description:
Contains:

Speed Queen

Adventures of Kathy Kosmos: The Big Prick Planet

Skutsville

Wallstreet Crash

Expatriot

Tombstone Hand... Graveyard Mind...

Mr Toad Throws It All Away

Awakening of a Potatoe

Pope Paul: Only in America

America Love It of Leave It

City Beautiful

Tomorrowman: Heroes Out Of Work

Tit Slit Kapers

Mr Toad Meets Mr Jack Ass

Yellow Dog

volume.name: Cortez and the Fall of the Aztecs

description:
THE SATIRICAL MASTERPIECE THAT USHERED IN THE GRAPHIC NOVEL ERA TO EUROPEAN COMICS… FINALLY AVAILABLE IN ENGLISH

One of the earliest full-length, standalone graphic novels to be published in Europe, and certainly one of the best and most original, Ici Même was serialized in the adult French comics monthly (A suivre) in the early 1980s and then released in book form. A quarter of a century later, this dark, funny, consistently surprising masterpiece has finally been translated into English.

An unexpected yet smoothly confident collaboration between the darkly cynical Jacques Tardi and the playful fantasist Jean-Claude Forest (of Barbarella fame), You Are There is set on a small island off the coast of France, where unscrupulous landowners have succeeded in overtaking the land from the last heir of a previously wealthy family. That heir, whose domain, in a Beckettian twist, is now reduced to the walls that border these patches of land he used to own, prowls the walls all day, eking out a living by collecting tolls at each gate.

His seemingly hopeless struggle to recover his birthright becomes complicated as the government sees a way of using his plight for the sake of political expediency, and the romantic intervention of the daughter of one of the landowners (who has her own sordid history with the politician) engenders further difficulties, culminating in an apocalyptic, hallucinatory finale.

Set in Tardi’s preferred early 20th century milieu, You Are There is drawn in his crisp 1980s neo-“clear line” style, gorgeously detailed, elegantly stylized, with impossibly deep slabs of black: You Are There is a feast for both the eyes and the brain.

Is Bob Fingerman a cynical misanthrope or a disappointed humanitarian? Dare we suggest maybe both? In You Deserved It, the sensitive creator of the acclaimed graphic novel Beg the Question accesses his darker side, serving up this caustic collection of comical cautionary chronicles. What Beg the Question was to sex and romance, You Deserved It is to wanton violence and social wrongness.

From Otis Goes Hollywood, the epic saga of a homicidally puritanical meat packer with dreams of making it big in Hollywood, to Missing Pieces, a yarn about the extracurricular activities of paramedics, to Buying Bologna, about a guy who just really, really loves his luncheon meat, to Yiffy Situation, a fuzzy fable about fornicating Furries, You Deserved It serves up enough yarns to make one hilariously misanthropic sweater, all in living-and dying-color!

At last: the seventh hardcover collection of the greatest superhero comic in the universe! This volume reprints the Viltrumite War storyline, as well as the stories showing the ripple effects on Earth resulting from Mark's decisions following that landmark battle.

Collects INVINCIBLE #71-84
name: Invincible Ultimate Collection 7

description: Lost somewhere between Missouri and Iowa (after surviving the events of The Last Zombie: Inferno), the team stops to repair their vehicles and scavenge supplies. But they soon learn that they aren't the only scavengers in town when a horde of ravenous, swarming rats attack the convoy!

The Phantom's wolf sidekick, Devil, gets captured by the prince and is forced to fight in the bear pit.

2nd story: Mandrake- Mandrake Faces The Octon Part-I.
name: The Tale Of Devil Part-I

description:
Devil, the Phantom's faithful companion is captured by the highland prince. Impressed by his aggressiveness, the prince puts Devil into his bear pit. Devil's capture does not go unnoticed and the Phantom in his quest reaches the spot and finds Devil fighting a losing battle.

2nd story: Mandrake- Mandrake Faces The Octon Part-II.
name: The Tale Of Devil Part-II

description: Captain Fishleg and all the crew of the "Golden Baby" disappeared into the waters of the Atlantic, while they were chasing the "Red Death", a giant sperm whale, whose fame lives and grows in the stories that the sailors of the coast tell in a low voice in smoky taverns of the ports ... Zagor and Virginia Humboldt, alarmed by an identical dream in which Ramath the fakir asks them for help, embark with Cico on the "Dark Shark" of Captain Sinn, in order to discover what was the fate of their friends ...
name: Incubo sul mare

description: In Department 51, the research about the anomalies and the portals that open passages to other universes goes on. The arrival of the dimensional voyager Tyron takes Nicole Bayeux and her team to meet Hasan Lahore, member of one of the families who are fighting against the mysterious Manipulator and his dangerous symbionts. The fight against these enemies can begin, not before the Department 51 agents face their dark and secret past…
name: Dipartimento 51 - Il Manipolatore

description:
A minor military base in a remote corner of the British Isles would not be the place you'd expect to find a battle royal raging. And if you did, how could a group of the Home Guard's old warriors stand up to an enemy attack.

They may have been put to the test in battles past, but that was a long time ago. And what of the Home Guard's youngster, would he be up to the task? You can bet he would try.

Invaders beware!
name: Invasion Dawn

description:
The history books of the First World War concentrate on events on the Western Front in France, the scene of the fiercest battles the world had ever seen. The fighting, though, was not confined to France, for all over Europe armies faced each other.

In Greece, Italians, Greeks, Austrians and Germans battled it out on the plains and in the mountains.

Into this cauldron rode British Army Lieutenant John Fielding, little guessing that some of his enemies were prepared to go beyond the normal rules of war…
name: Murder in the Heights

description:
"LET THE OTHER BLOKE BE THE MUG"

While his 8th Army mates fought and died under the glaring desert sun of North Africa, Private Sam Deacon was content to drive a truck. Not for him the blood and guts of battle, the risk of stopping a German bullet: "Let the other bloke be the mug," was his motto.

Then he met one of the 'other blokes' who wasn't a mug - a hero who rammed those words down Deacon's throat till he squealed for mercy - and found himself a hero too.
name: Lone Hero

description:
Stuck in a shore job, Sub-Lieutenant Mike Wilson was desperate to see action - so desperate he even volunteered to check out an unexploded Jap bomb lodged in the hold of a merchant ship.

After surviving that ordeal, he thought serving in a sub would be a piece of cake. But with bombs, depth-charges and enemy suicide planes to contend with, he couldn't have been more wrong!
name: Death from the Sky

description:
Harry Houdini, Elsewhere’s agent, needs to find out the secret of a robot coming alive, in order to save his friend Aldous!

December 1918. While America is celebrating the end of World War I, there’s a disquieting figure roaming New York’s back alleys, sending panic waves through the population. It’s a robot who inexplicably escaped the movie studio where Harry Houdini – the “escape artist” who’s surprising the world with his astonishing shows – is filming his first feature. But the celebrated illusionist is a secret agent of the mysterious “Elsewhere”: when his old friend Aldous Morrigan goes into a coma after a dramatic turn of events, Houdini’s only choice is to find out what gives life to the big metal machine. The terrifying truth about it is to be found in the diary of another famous man of their time: writer Jack London. The tale of one of his adventures in the snows of the Yukon is concealing the secret of the robot !
name: Il terrore che venne dallo schermo

description:
Revelations from the secret archives of "Elsewhere": another case beyond the limits of the impossible, an epic mission entrusted to Giuseppe Garibaldi, a story you won’t find mentioned in history books!

The United States, the location - its exact whereabouts being only hazily indicated –of the highly mysterious “Elsewhere” base, the Year of Our Lord 1851. A series of circumstances leads the government Administration, held in the firm grip of a terrible “Steel Lady” who’s called “Papà” by her subordinates, to enroll a fighter of most exceptional audacity and daring among her agents, Giuseppe Garibaldi, “Joseph” to the iron-willed mistress of “Elsewhere”. His brief is one of the most sensitive: to cross China, which is being ravaged by revolts and wars whereby the various Tongs are pitted against one another, and kill the mysterious “Spider”, the head of an extremely powerful esoteric sect whose intrigues even cast their sinister lengthening shadows over the American democracy…
name: L'artiglio che si strinse sull'America

description:
From the secret archives of Altrove, the chronicle of the last case solved by the great Sherlock Holmes!

The story begins in 1910, with the arrival of a high-ranking guest at the mysterious government base of Altrove: his name is John Watson, and he’s come to hear the story of the last mission undertaken on behalf of Altrove by his friend Sherlock Holmes. Meanwhile, there’s a craft making its way towards the base, and on board there’s a sinister masked passenger, who can perhaps supply the answers to Watson’s questions…
name: La donna che visse in due mondi

description: Do you remember the humorous tale by Mark Twain entitled “The Celebrated Jumping Frog of Calaveras County "? Well, if its official version concealed another, masked by the author because it was far more disquieting and carried the tell-tale signs of a monstrous interplanetary plot, would you still feel like laughing? We beg permission to express doubts, and to prove this to you, we invite you to follow the agents of the Elsewhere base, the Nineteenth-century one, on the tracks of the horrible giant toothless frogs that are spreading panic throughout the region of the Appalachians!
name: L'uomo che raccontava storie

description: Year 1896. Some mysterious disappearances alert the agents of Elsewhere base, who discover the existence of a dimensional opening that conducts towards an obscure world called the Black Loggia. Investigating with themis Sherlock Holmes, the king of all investigators, in search of his brother Mycoft, who is also missing. The key to the puzzle seems however to lie in the past of a woman who suffers from amnesia...
name: L'ombra che sfidò Sherlock Holmes

description: The Heroes of the North saga begins here! When the threat of an international terrorist organization looms, ready to strike North America, the Canadian government is forced to put together an elite team of superheroes - heroes who kill. This exciting one-shot relates the dark origins of the controversial Canadian Shield; electro-blasting femme fatale Fleur-de-Lys; drug-addicted nanobot-enhanced Black Terror; loud mouth ninja 8 Ball; west coast speedster Pacifica; and the sultry queens of evil: the disfigured Madame Doom and the deadly Hornet.
name: Dark Origins

description: Great Britain, 1896. The legendary investigator Sherlock Holmes is called to Mycroft, the village where he was born, in Yorkshire, to solve a complex case of murder and missing persons. The facts have also aroused the interest of the director of Elsewhere, who has sent one of his agents to the place. For there is a sinister mystery that links the woods around Mycroft to the Forest of Ghostwood, in the state of Washington...
name: La cosa che attende nella nebbia

description: United States, 1776. Benjamin Franklin, his old friend Jean Louis Bientot, Amanda, a girl with supernatural powers, and the future president Thomas Jefferson, find themselves allied in a battle against a very powerful demon, who threatens to enslave all humanity under his power. A vicious struggle that ends up with the establishment of a secret base to study paranormal phenomena. A base which will be called Elsewhere!
name: Colui che dimora nelle tenebre

description: In 1964, an incredible work of art is discovered in Washington which was created by James Hampton over the previous twenty years. Since then, the Hampton throne has remained on show at the Museum of American art and, in the present day, is being studied by Mystère and the “chronosopher” Fredricks. The throne actually possesses strange powers linked to the passing of time, powers that are let loose and that put Martin’s life in danger and even that of the President of the United States, Bill Clinton!
name: Il trono di Hampton

description: What is lost in life is found in--death! Aspen Comics is proud to offer you its newest original series, BROKEN PIECES! In a future torn apart by the deadly catastrophe of biological contamination, pollution and corporate greed, one man will discover an even more tragic fate. Dr. Richard Adams, along with his loving wife, Dr. Gabriella Adams, stood at the forefront of research in advanced medicine and bio-rejuvenation. However, one fateful-and fatal-- moment will change everything about their purpose, their relationship, and each other. When the tragedy of events literally tears apart everything about his being, Richard is left with no choice but to pick up the fragmented pieces of his reality in order to save his wife-as well as potentially the fate of mankind. Featuring an all new 12-page prelude story that sets the stage for the brand-new BROKEN PIECES #1 issue heading your way next month, this special zero issue comes complete with an additional sketchbook section, never before seen art, and a stunning cover by hot new series artist Micah Kaneshiro. Not to be missed, make sure you get in on the ground floor of this exciting new series!
name: Prelude
Acredite... Se Puder
Os Penetras
Tutto Pippo - La moto... d'annata
Un nipote tutto d'oro... - Paperino super domestico
Il papero aureo - L'economico capolavoro
Il mistero dei nani di gesso
Der Mann, der Grüne Leuchte ermordete!

description:
During the emergency evacuation of a laboratory in the jungle, a young researcher does not agree to run away and decides to return to the place where he plans to find the woman he loves. The Special Agent May Frayn is forced to chase him first and then to help him discover the terrifying secret that is hidden in the basement of the base.

Sent in the ancient city of Babylon to investigate the mysterious interdimensional anomalies occurring there, May, Sigmund and Monique will face the terrible secret behind the timeless ruins

The secretary of Solomon Darver, Janine Spengler, has, for once in life, to fulfill the operational assignments, and during a day full of emotions, she understands what are the difficulties that his colleagues face every day, in that what will be her last adventure.
name: La strage degli innocenti
